DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of ABT-719 in patients undergoing high risk major surgery.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Trial of Multiple Dosing Regimens of ABT-719 for the Prevention of Acute Kidney Injury in Subjects Undergoing High Risk Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing high risk major surgery in subjects with cardiovascular disease who are at risk of AKI. Ongoing or recent history of sepsis Has recent documented acute kidney injury. Subject is scheduled to have a total or partial nephrectomy.
